headline: Danaher Appoints Jonathan Leiken as General Counsel
summary: Danaher Corporation (NYSE: DHR), a leading global life sciences and diagnostics innovator, today announced that Jonathan Leiken has been appointed Senior Vice President and General Counsel, effective August 25, 2025. Mr. Leiken will report directly to President and Chief Executive Officer Rainer Blair and will serve as an executive officer and a member of the Danaher Leadership Team.
